comments: Terrific teacher - takes attendance every day, so don\'t skip! His tests for upper division classes are 10 essay questions, so lots of writing. He\'s very fair and his hands-on experience on the topics are amazing. One of my favorite professors, and convinced me to go to law school! Even helped me study! A++

Good guy who has real experience with the subject. Has lots of personal stories (which he tends to repeat if you have him in more than one class) that are interesting and relevant. Very willing to help if asked.
